name: Raid on Gravitron
overview: Raid on Gravitron is a 1st person space shooter for the 8-bit Atari. Played from 1st person perspective, the player tries to destroy a number of alien ships before their fuel runs out. The player fires a red laser, while alien vessels return fire, which must be dodged. Only one enemy ship appears on the screen at a time, and when they are destroyed, a new enemy appears. The player has a limited energy supply, and the goal is to destroy all alien vessels before fuel runs out. There is a training and combat mode of gameplay. The player starts with 10 ships.
